channel.title: The Walkoff featuring Dan & Noah
channel.description: The Walkoff featuring Dan & Noah provides fantasy sports fans & baseball fans alike with weekly in-depth analysis of the goings on in the world of Major League Baseball and how to turn it into fantasy baseball success. Also check out our official myspace page: http://www.myspace.com/The_Walkoff
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Commitment to Fantasy Excellence
channel.itunes:author: Daniel Fleming
channel.itunes:summary: The Walkoff featuring Dan & Noah provides fantasy sports fans & baseball fans alike with weekly in-depth analysis of the goings on in the world of Major League Baseball and how to turn it into fantasy baseball success. Also check out our official myspace page: http://www.myspace.com/The_Walkoff

item.title: AL Central Breakdown (Week 4)
item.description: Episode 4: Dan & Noah breakdown the AL Central and highlight players who will have an impact in fantasy play.
item.dc:creator: Daniel Fleming
item.itunes:summary: Episode 4: Dan & Noah breakdown the AL Central and highlight players who will have an impact in fantasy play.

item.title: NL East Breakdown (Week 3)
item.description: Episode 3: Dan & Noah breakdown the NL East and highlight players who will have an impact in fantasy play.
item.dc:creator: Daniel Fleming
item.itunes:summary: Episode 3: Dan & Noah breakdown the NL East and highlight players who will have an impact in fantasy play.

item.title: AL East Breakdown (Week 2)
item.description: Episode 2: Dan & Noah discuss what's going on in the AL East team by team and how it reflects in fantasy play.
item.dc:creator: Daniel Fleming
item.itunes:summary: Episode 2: Dan & Noah discuss what's going on in the AL East team by team and how it reflects in fantasy play.

item.title: Fantasy Draft Analysis (Week 1)
item.description: Premiere Episode: Dan & Noah introduce The Walkoff and their own analysis of who to look for on draft day.
item.dc:creator: Daniel Fleming
item.itunes:summary: Premiere Episode: Dan & Noah introduce The Walkoff and their own analysis of who to look for on draft day.
